title: Kings, Queens, Heroes, & Fools
description: *Newly Formatted for modern eReaders. Join Hyden Hawk some new friends, on a quest over land sea. Fight with Mikahl, Ironspike, fierce King Jarrek as they try to free the enslaved people of Wildermont from King Raâ€™Gren's Overlords. Patrol the sky with Shaella her dragon, Vrot. Demonic love, bloody battles, foolish heroics await readers in this continuation of a truly epic trilogy.
author: M.R. Mathias
